motivation.author: Winston Churchill
motivation.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

motivation.author: Mark Twain
motivation.quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.

motivation.author: Walt Disney
motivation.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: I’ve missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
motivation.author: Michael Jordan

motivation.quote: Don’t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
motivation.author: Mary Kay Ash

motivation.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
motivation.author: Chinese Proverb

motivation.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
motivation.author: Babe Ruth

motivation.quote: I wake up every morning and think to myself, ‘how far can I push this company in the next 24 hours.
motivation.author: Leah Busque

motivation.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
motivation.author: Michele Ruiz

motivation.quote: We need to accept that we won’t always make the right decisions, that we’ll screw up royally sometimes – understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it’s part of success.
motivation.author: Arianna Huffington

motivation.quote: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE.
motivation.author: Joss Whedon

motivation.quote: You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching, love like you’ll never be hurt, sing like there’s nobody listening, and live like it’s heaven on earth.
motivation.author: William W. Purkey

motivation.quote: Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten.
motivation.author: Neil Gaiman
